heading: Today
text: Dense fog through the river valleys burning off by mid-morning.  Sunny and cool.  Highs in the upper 60s to low 70s, a few mid 70s in the warmer valleys.  Light north winds, less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear in the evening, then mixing with clouds.  Not as chilly.  Areas of river valley fog re-forming.  Lows in the 40s.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Patchy valley fog burning off to clouds mixed with periods of sunshine.  A slight chance of an afternoon shower west and south of I-89.  Highs in the low to mid 70s, near 70 over the higher terrain north.  Light winds.
